column2: In preparation for Mereth-nuin-Giliath, you must choose how you are to feed your guests. What standard should you instruct your steward to set for the feast this year?
Only the finest wine and most exquisite food!
Wine and modest food will suffice.
Just serve them whatever is available that day
In preparation for Mereth-nuin-Rîn, you must choose how you are to feed your guests. What standard should you instruct your steward to set for the feast this year?
Only the finest wine and most exquisite food!
Wine and modest food will suffice.
Just serve them whatever is available that day...
In preparation for Amrug-u-Durin, you must choose how you are to feed your guests. What standard should you instruct your steward to set for the feast this year?
Only the finest ale and most exquisite salted pork!
Ale and modest food will suffice.
Just serve them whatever is available that day...
Most of the preparations for the feast has been made, now I only have to send out the invitations!
column3: Les préparatifs du banquet touchent à leur fin et il ne me reste plus qu’à envoyer les invitations !
column4: Die meisten Vorbereitungen für das Gelage sind abgeschlossen. Jetzt muss ich nur noch die Einladungen verschicken!
column6: ¡Ya están terminados la mayoría de los preparativos, ahora solo tengo que enviar las invitaciones!

column3: Par la présente, je vous invite à...
column4: Hiermit lade ich Euch ein zum ...'

column2: I have given the orders for a Great Feast to be hosted in [Root.Location.GetName]. Let the preparations begin...
column3: J’ai demandé à ce qu’un grand banquet soit organisé à [Root.Location.GetName]. Que les préparatifs commencent...
column4: Ich habe ein Großes Gelage in [Root.Location.GetName] angeordnet. Mögen die Vorbereitungen beginnen ...
column6: He dado orden de que se celebre un gran festejo en [Root.Location.GetName]. Que empiecen los preparativos...
